reviews.review: Es tenso, divertido pero medio corto.

A game that puts an excellent twist on the Puzzle Genre. Portal is one that tests the creativity of its players, allowing them to create new solutions in a simple way. The campaign shows how "Aperture Laboratories," the setting of the game, once was a Lab meant for creating technology, soon became run down, & controlled by the corrupt robot "GLaDOS," the one who guides you through the puzzle rooms or "Test Chambers." But if you want a challenge, the Bonus Stages give a twist on the Test Chambers from the campaign. Either you would be using a limited amount of portals, trying not to walk as much, beat a chamber in the fastest time, or just being a remixed & harder version of a stage. These bonus stages make the player push their familiarity of the chamber & use every resource they can to pass, which is very challenging. Portal is still a masterpiece in gaming & I highly recommend it. 9/10

Portal is consistently one of the most interesting and concise games that exists out there. I played it once about ten or so years ago and just replayed it and it remained one of the most fresh and interesting experiences despite being more than a decade old. I highly recommend anyone who has not yet played it checks it out and then its sequel, Portal 2.
Fun, addiction, and will lead you to portal 2 which will be even better but start with this one so you can get the story!

Should have played this game sooner. I can see why it deserves the title of being a classic PC game. Although short, it's a great puzzle game with witty humour and still holds up well despite it being 15 years old. You won't regret buying this game.
Portal как по мне лучшие головолмки на Source

Chell rises from a stasis inside of a glass box
She isn't greeted by faces, Only concrete and clocks.
That's when she first hears GLaDOS, Computer that talks.
She's told to leave the little room, but has no shoes and no socks.
She trusted the computer 'Cause the voice sounded nice.
So she traveled through the center And followed all its advice.
But when she starts taking blood, She started thinking twice.
It was the first time that she used the Hand-held Portal Device.
She puts some holes in the walls And the ceilings then the floors.
It was a weapon to create Inter-dimensional doors.
Still, the tests keep getting harder and she needed a break.
That's when the voice began to barter with the promise of cake.
GLaDOS: Uh-oh. Somebody cut the cake.
All alone and she's wondering why. She has a bad feeling like she's going to die.
She hides from the cameras and begins to cry.
She'll never believe the cake is a lie.
Voice: Cake is a lie.
Turret: Are you still there?
GLaDOS had a wicked habit of enhancing the truth.
Chell knew not to expect to get to see end proof.
She had a sneaking suspicion That the cake was a spoof.
Yet, she continued with her mission on account of her sweet tooth.
Three tests to finish She was nearing the end.
She met Companion Cube And they became the best of friends.
But as with anything good, This thing was too good to last.
She had to burn her best friend To be allowed to pass.
GLaDOS realized her spirit Was far too strong to break.
She had completed all the tests And never made a mistake.
Her mouth began to water, Her hands started to shake.
She knew it couldn't be much farther, She could almost taste the cake.
All alone and she's wondering why. She has a bad feeling like she's going to die.
She hides from the cameras and begins to cry.
She'll never believe the cake is a lie.
GLaDOS: Didn't we have some fun?
Still One of my Favourite Games
It's really good cake is so fucking good
